content: this is a quick simple hat pattern it is really two hat patterns but they are so basic that they can be changed up infinitely i have been making these for friends and family since high school as quick gifts and found it was a great basic pattern to use in the beginning crochet classes i taught in college at the lys so i typed it up and now offer it up for anyone that would like to use it if you find that the hat is a bit big go down a hook size or do one less increase row
